column2: SELECT nm.id AS message_id, nm.message, nm.timestamp, nm.category, nm.like_count, nm.dislike_count, nm.comment_count, na.id AS attachment_id, a.id AS user_id,  a.firstname AS first_name, a.lastname AS last_name, a.neighborhood AS user_neighborhood , COALESCE(nl.like_opt, #) AS like  ,t.trip_id, t.route_id, r.route_short_name, t.direction_id  FROM dv.notes_message nm LEFT JOIN dv.account a  ON nm.user_id = a.id LEFT JOIN dv.notes_attachment na  ON nm.id = na.message_id  LEFT JOIN dv.notes_like AS nl  ON nl.message_id = nm.id AND nl.user_id = $#  LEFT JOIN m.trip t  ON nm.trip_id=t.trip_id  AND t.agency_id=nm.agency_id  LEFT JOIN m.route r  ON t.route_id=r.route_id  AND t.agency_id=r.agency_id  WHERE nm.deleted IS NULL AND nm.agency_id IN (SELECT agency_id FROM m.agency WHERE agency_id_id IN (SELECT agency_id_id FROM m.agency WHERE agency_id = $#))  AND (a.verified IS NOT NULL OR nm.user_id = $#)  AND nm.category::text = $#  AND nm.reply_to=$#  AND nm.trip_id=$#  ORDER BY timestamp DESC  LIMIT $#
